text: My name is Michael Watterson

and I'm the Head of Cloud
and Technology Services at The NIB Group.
At NIB, our purpose is your better health.

And we are trusted by more 
than 1.7 million people.
Working with the AWS Security team,
we were confident that our platform was

aligned with the regulatory requirements
and the requirements of our business.

This would ensure that our 
ongoing operational strategies

would remain compliant
with these standards.

Some of the main outcomes
I've seen since the migration to cloud

is an increase in business resiliency
and operational efficiencies.

Leveraging AWS has been a key driver
for innovation at NIB,

enabling us to run thousands
of workloads safely and securely.
With the migration to cloud,

weâ€™ve enabled the business
a secure platform where they can test

and learn at speed and scale
and stick within our security guardrails.

We have continued our relationship
with the AWS Professional Services team,

focusing on operational
and security strategies.

Our members, participants, and travelers
can trust NIB knowing that we're working

with AWS to keep their personal
information safe and secure.
